projects.name: Thregnar and the Crystals of Chaos
projects.description: I’m currently programming and animating an upcoming indie game titled Thregnar and the Crystals of Chaos.

projects.name: Whiplash
projects.description: Whiplash is a grappling hook themed 3D platformer that was a group project developed at RIT.

projects.name: Purple Wurple
projects.description: I’ve published a puzzle platformer game titled Purple Wurple on Itch.io. This game is designed around a unique stretch and stick mechanic.

projects.name: Fire and Roses JOKER
projects.description: Fire and Roses JOKER is an online slot game I contributed to during my time at MahiGaming.

projects.name: Blazing Bison Gold Blitz
projects.description: Blazing Bison was a game developed at MahiGaming to capitalize on the success of Gold Blitz.

projects.name: Bruno's Gallo Gold
projects.description: Bruno's Gallo Gold was the first of the three games I worked on during my time at MahiGaming.

projects.name: Firework Sandbox
projects.description: Firework Sandbox is a project I created at Rochester Institute of Technology. The goal was to have an interactive webpage with adjustable settings.

projects.name: Amiibo Database
projects.description: The Amiibo Database was an RIT project based around converting APIs into a user friendly program.
